features: Space-saving design: Lovitgo swing arms led desk lamp can be easily collapsed and stored, making it ideal for those with limited space in their home or office. Also, Lovitgo LED desk lamp with high color rendering index (CRI>90) can produce soft non-flickering and anti-glare, accurately present color, close to natural light, and less blue light.

Adjustable color and brightness: Lovitgo home office led desk lamp has a range of brightness levels that can be adjusted to suit your needs, allowing you to work or study comfortably in any lighting conditions. It includes 5 dimmable levels and adjustable color temperatures modes. You can press and hold the panel for stepless dimming (20% - 100%) and stepless tempering (3000K - 6500K). The memory function will restore your last settings.

45° Angle asymmetrical lighting design: This office light for home office is designed to emit a soft, flicker-free light that is gentle on the eyes, reducing eye strain and fatigue. The light does not shine directly on the screen, nor does it shine directly on the eyes. Perfect for reading, drawing, painting, design and DIY.

Energy-efficient: The desk lamp uses LED technology, which consumes very little power and lasts much longer than traditional bulbs, making it an eco-friendly and cost-effective lighting solution. Lovitgo desk lamps do not flash to better protect your eyes.

Versatile: The lamp's flexible gooseneck and adjustable, making it ideal for reading, studying, working, or relaxing. There are 7 rotatable joints that can be freely adjusted vertically and horizontally. You can rotate the side light strips on both sides 270° back and forth to change the lighting angle. You can place the lamp body 180° left and right on the side of the table, and adjust the height. The base can rotate 360° to adjust the position.
body.description: Illuminate the Night with 45° Asymmetric Lighting Design The 45° asymmetric lighting design creates a unique and angled beam of light that illuminates your space in a way that traditional lighting cannot. Not only is the 45° asymmetric lighting design aesthetically pleasing, but it's also highly functional. It provides ample lighting for reading, working, and other activities while reducing glare and minimizing eye strain. Its angled light ensures that light is concentrated where you need it most, so you can focus on the task at hand.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Lovitgo 24W Brightest Architect Desk Lamp for Home Office, 37.4" Wide Tall Desk Lamp with Clamp,Adjustable Desk Lamp with Memory Function The Lovitgo 24W Brightest Architect Desk Lamp is the perfect lighting solution for your home office. With a lamp head that is 37.4" wide and tall, you can be sure that this desk lamp will provide ample light coverage for your workspace. The adjustable desk lamp comes with a clamp that can be attached to any desk or table, making it easy to position the light exactly where you need it.The Lovitgo desk lamp also features a memory function, which allows you to save your preferred light settings. This means that you can set the lamp to your desired brightness and color temperature and then easily switch back to these settings every time you turn on the lamp.With 24W of power, this architectural desk lamp is the brightest in its class, ensuring that you will have plenty of light to get your work done. The lamp also boasts a sleek and modern design, making it a stylish addition to any home office.Overall, the Lovitgo 24W Brightest Architect Desk Lamp is a high-quality, functional, and stylish lighting solution that will help you achieve maximum productivity in your home office.

LED with High Color Rendering Index (CRI>90) LED lights with high color rendering index (CRI>90) are preferred as they offer several advantages. Firstly, these lights are able to produce soft non-flickering light which is easier on the eyes and reduces eye strain. Secondly, they offer anti-glare properties which make them ideal for use in a variety of settings, including offices, homes, and public spaces. Thirdly, high CRI LED lights are able to accurately present color, ensuring that users are able to see colors as they should be seen. Fourthly, high CRI LED lights are able to produce light that is close to natural light, which can enhance the overall look and feel of a space. Finally, high CRI LED lights emit less blue light, which can help to reduce the negative impacts of blue light on human health. Overall, LED lights with high CRI are an excellent choice for anyone looking for high-quality lighting that is both effective and efficient.

LED Desk Lampwith Memory Function A memory function allows your LED light to remember the last setting you had it on before turning it off, eliminating the need to constantly adjust the brightness every time you turn it on. This is particularly useful for those who use their LED lights for specific tasks like reading, studying, or working. The memory function ensures that your LED light is always at the perfect brightness level for your needs, making it a convenient and time-saving solution. Illuminate the Night with 45° Asymmetric Lighting Design The 45° asymmetric lighting design creates a unique and angled beam of light that illuminates your space in a way that traditional lighting cannot. Not only is the 45° asymmetric lighting design aesthetically pleasing, but it's also highly functional. It provides ample lighting for reading, working, and other activities while reducing glare and minimizing eye strain. Its angled light ensures that light is concentrated where you need it most, so you can focus on the task at hand.

The Ultimate Multi-application LED Light with Clip - Perfect for Any Task This versatile LED light with clip is the ultimate lighting solution for any task. With its innovative design and clip-on feature, this LED light can be attached to any surface, making it perfect for use in a variety of settings.This multi-application LED light is ideal for reading, working, crafting, and even camping. Its powerful LED lights provide bright, clear light so you can easily see what you're working on. The light also features several different settings that allow you to adjust the brightness and color temperature, so you can customize the lighting to your preference.This LED light is not only perfect for indoor use, but also perfect as a gift for friends, sons, daughters due to its lightweight, portable design.Whether you need a reliable light source for completing tasks at home, in the office, or while on the go, this highly versatile, multi-application LED light with clip is the perfect lighting solution for any task.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Awesome lighting work multiple colors and brightness settings and very easy to install.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love my light omg the best purchase I have made in a while ❤️

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 4, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My husband needed a lamp to use during zoom when he is on his meetings and the lamp is perfect for his office space and the versatility or the lamp is amazing. The fact he is able to move the lights anyway he needs and the sturdiness of the clamps to the desk is great. To be able to touch the lamps to adjust the lighting, turning them on and off, including dimming has been perfect for him. This was worth the order and exactly what he needed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy, nice to have the power button on the light itself, only one small complaint
reviews.reviewText: Awesome light! Easy to set up. Love that the power button is on the light itself rather than a switch on the cord. And plenty bright. The only complaint I found I wish it was able to do was to set the dimmer a notch or two lower than what it has, for when I just want a little hint of light while working on the computer. Great light, though.

reviews.reviewerName: I review therefore I am!!I review therefore I am!!
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Bright, Versatile and Beautiful Industrial Design
reviews.reviewText: For my standing desk, this light has been a game changer. You can literally use these lights as spread out or targeted as each side of the light is individually movable. It also articulates in a rise up or bowing position.The adjustable color and brightness are also great features. I can adjust the light to suit my needs, whether I'm working, reading, or relaxing. The 45° Angle asymmetrical lighting design is also very helpful. The light doesn't shine directly in my eyes, which helps to reduce eye strain. You can also easily dim the lights or increase them to your liking.Overall, I'm very happy with this desk lamp. It's a great value for the price. I would definitely recommend it to anyone looking for a new desk lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: ***Update***The seller contacted me in regards to my review and offered to send me a replacement item. I was really happy about this because I really wanted to use this light on my desk and it fit nicely over my 35" ultrawide. Its in place and so far so good. Once I use it for a while Ill update this post, but was impressed with the customer service the seller provided._____Today when I initially installed this light I realized how stiff the joints were to move, but the material it’s made out of isn’t very durable. It’s made from some cheap metal and plastic so you will need to be gentle moving the head around. I have a 35” curved ultrawide on an expensive desk mounted stand/arm, which brings it up to about 8” from the desk. This light fits/hovers over the top of the monitor without any issues. Using the monitor light is another story though. It appears that it so cheaply made that If you moved it around too much. It doesn’t look like it would last very long. So I took it off my desk until I flip my desk around where my monitor would be stationary, then I was going to reinstall it again. After taking the light down I realized how cheap the screw base was and grabbed my camera to take a picture when the swivel thing that help secure it to the desk, broke off the torque screw! Talk about something cheaply made! Without that piece attached to the screw this lamp is pretty much useless because it can’t stand up! Prior to that the light was nice and bright and could change the color hue of the lights, now it’s just a $45 piece of junk!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Wide and Intuitive Controls
reviews.reviewText: This monitor lamp clamps onto the back of your desk and hovers above your monitor to give you some reprieve from the long hours at your screen. The arms of the light branches, and curse, so it is even suitable for curved monitors. There are many settings for the color temperature of the lamp so you can go from cool to warm in a few taps. There is also button that is marked "A", and it autocorrects for light, bright and dark light presets. Construction is sturdy and the light is diffuse. It is also very easy to use. I highly recommend this monitor lamp!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This LED desk light lights up a wide area of desk work space without shining in your eyes. There are 5 levels of brightness and color temperature to choose from with the touch of a button or you can long-hold the same button for a faster change of lighting levels.It has a nice, slim-lined, narrow design and, because it is mounted to the desk with a screw on clamp, it's pretty sturdy and it takes up very little desk space. I like being able to quickly and easily change lighting angles and width of exposure with one or both of the overhead arms, which can independently swing 270 degrees forward and back. Both side arms can also be moved together, as a unit, from the head mount of the lamp or upwards and downwards using the rear height adjusting arm.
